sentence: and moved to aid her primary opponent, Harriet Hageman, who is former president Donald Trump's preferred candidate for Wyoming's lone congressional seat.
title: Opinion: The Republican Party formally declares that truth is fiction and patriots are traitors

sentence: 2022 Midterm Elections More What to watch for in Texas' primary elections Trump's response to Putin's invasion of Ukraine reveals GOP fissures Democrats seize on GOP Senator Rick Scott's plan to tax more Americans Congressman Colin Allred discusses Democrats' midterm prospects Kevin McCarthy backs Liz Cheney's primary challenger Harriet Hageman More Caitlin Huey-Burns Caitlin Huey-Burns is a political reporter for CBS News.
title: Biden's low approvals worry Democrats campaigning in midterm elections

sentence: Stefanik also made one endorsement in the Senate for GOP candidate Jane Timken in Ohio and last month joined House GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., in taking the rare step of backing a primary challenger to a GOP colleague when they endorsed Harriet Hageman in her race against Rep. Liz Cheney in Wyoming.
title: Elise Stefanik unveils new endorsements for 2022 midterm elections

sentence: FIRST ON FOX - Harriet Hageman, the GOP congressional candidate waging a primary challenge against Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., with the backing of former President Donald Trump, argues in a new digital campaign that the Republican incumbent is out of touch with voters and is "obsessed with her personal war" against Trump.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump-backed Wyoming GOP primary challenger Hageman urges sending Cheney home to Virginia'
